description: This tour will give an insight into the many different eras and building styles represented on one of Croydon's busiest streets- from Victorian industry, the World Wars, 1930s trade, Brutalism and even a ghost swimming pool.

factsheet.heading: Clothing and footwear
paragraphs: Please wear comfortable shoes for a 1.5 hr walk and weather appropriate clothing. Please bring your own drink/refreshments as the tour will only pass by shops at the end of the walk

location.address: Purley War Memorial Hospital, 856 Brighton Rd, Purley, Croydon
travel_info: Additional travel info: Tour ends near to Wandle Park tram stop

name: Purley Way History Tour
